channel.title: Hair problems(Help with coding Hair saloon inference)
channel.description:
I was wondering how you would code it that is you clicked a button say Action Button: 10229 how would you code that like.
case 10229:
what would come after that (besides a break; -.-)
This Playerlook number for hair: playerLook[1] = #; // HAIR
